2080110.name: This Land Is My Land - Trophy Guns DLC
2080110.description:
✓ Unique weapon bundles:
⠀⠀⠀▪ Sharps & Co Thunder MKV Hawk Bundle (never seen before scoped stun rifle)
⠀⠀⠀▪ Palmer Repeater Model 1882 Fury Bundle
⠀⠀⠀▪ Cole 1848 Feral Spirit Bundle
⠀⠀⠀▪ Chapman Works M1887 Claw Bundle
* weapon bundles comes with ammo and stat-increasing meals
* bundles can be taken from the SOCIAL stash each 24 hours

✓ New Warpaints:
⠀⠀⠀▪ Trophy Red Clay
⠀⠀⠀▪ Trophy Gypsum

Upgrade your game and support This Land Is My Land by purchasing the Trophy Guns DLC.
2080110.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 俄语, 简体中文, 乌克兰语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 泰语, 土耳其语, 波兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
